content: I've always wanted to go to Africa. It's a beautiful place, full of amazing flora & fauna as well as interesting & unique people.
translations: ita:Ho sempre voluto andare in Africa. Ãˆ un posto bello, pieno di flora e fauna incredibili e di persone interessanti e unic
